channel.title: Rbenv on kerkerj
channel.description: Recent content in Rbenv on kerkerj

item.title: Install rails server env with rbenv on Ubuntu 14.04
item.description: nodejs v0.10.25 (for rails javascript engine) rbenv 0.4.0-98-g13a474c ruby 2.1.2p95 (2014-05-08 revision 45877) [x86_64-linux] Rails 4.1.4 nginx version: nginx/1.6.0 Phusion Passenger version 4.0.48 mysql Ver 14.14 Distrib 5.5.38, for debian-linux-gnu (x86_64) using readline 6.3 Installing Ruby & Rails sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade sudo apt-get install git-core curl zlib1g-dev build-essential libssl-dev libreadline-dev libyaml-dev libsqlite3-dev sqlite3 libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev python-software-properties nodejs npm Use rbenv cd git clone git://github.
